name: Maciej Zbikowski
biography: Zbikowski studied glassmaking at the WSRA in Wroclaw, and then at Warsaw ASP where he graduated in 1960 with a degree in graphic design.  Zbikowski's professional career has included work as an animator as well as an illustrator for several weekly magazines ("Szpilki", "Polska").  He has exhibited satirical cartoons and drawings in Warsaw, Russia, China, Vietnam and Germany.
